**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 46 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 44 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 41 [Seldeg Bheldis](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2431) **Source** [Pathfinder #186: Ghost King's Rage](/Sources.aspx?ID=189) pg. 36 **Perception** +26; darkvision **Languages** [Abyssal](/Languages.aspx?ID=12), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Infernal](/Languages.aspx?ID=19), [Kelish](/Languages.aspx?ID=38), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20), [Osiriani](/Languages.aspx?ID=40) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +33, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +30, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +30, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +28, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +30, [Warfare Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +30 **Str** +9 **Dex** +5 **Con** +9 **Int** +6 **Wis** +4 **Cha** +6 **Items** [Javelin](/Weapons.aspx?ID=71) (4), [Longsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=31), _+2 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [standard-grade adamantine](/Equipment.aspx?ID=139) [full plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=13)_, [_supreme sturdy shield_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=327) (Hardness 20^ HP 160^ BT 80) --- **AC** 41 (43 with shield raised) **Fort** +32 **Ref** +29 **Will** +26 **HP** 390 ([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42), rejuvenation)) **Immunities** [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27), [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40), [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) **Sacrilegious Aura** ([abjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=2), [aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64)) 30 feet. When a creature in the aura uses a [positive](/Traits.aspx?ID=128) spell or ability, the graveknight automatically attempts to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) it with a +27 counteract modifier.
**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)**
**Iron Command** **Trigger** An enemy within 15 feet damages Seldeg; **Effect** Seldeg puts an impertinent foe who dared harm him in their proper place. He commands the enemy to kneel in obedience. If they refuse, they must pay the price in pain and anguish. The triggering creature must choose one of the following options: the enemy kneels, dropping [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31) as a free action, or the enemy refuses and takes 5d6 mental damage. In addition, Seldeg's Strikes against the triggering creature deal an additional 3 damage until the end of his next turn. Seldeg chooses whether the additional damage is evil or negative each time he uses this reaction.
**[Shield Block](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=32)** --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** _greater flaming longsword_ +33 ([Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 3d8+17 slashing plus 2d10 fire **Melee** fist +34 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)), **Damage** 2d8+17 bludgeoning plus 2d10 fire **Ranged** flaming javelin +30 ([Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [thrown 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)), **Damage** 3d6+17 piercing plus 2d10 fire **Champion Devotion Spells** DC 35, 1 Focus Point - **8th** [Touch of Corruption](/Spells.aspx?ID=819) **Devastating Blast** ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72)) Seldeg unleashes a 30-foot cone of fire. Creatures in the area take 9d12 fire damage (DC 35 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). Seldeg can use this ability once every 1d4 rounds. **Graveknight's Curse** This curse affects anyone who wears Seldeg's armor for at least 1 hour. **Saving Throw** DC 35 Will save; **Onset** 1 hour; **Stage 1** [doomed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9) and can't remove the armor (1 day); **Stage 2** doomed 2, hampered 10, and can't remove the armor (1 day); **Stage 3** dies and transforms into Seldeg. **Phantom Steed** ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Conjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=33)) Seldeg summons a supernatural mount as per [_phantom steed_](/Spells.aspx?ID=221) (8th level). Unlike _phantom steed_, the steed's AC and saving throw bonuses are all 4 levels lower than Seldeg's, and the steed has one-third of Seldeg's Hit Points (rounded down). If the steed is destroyed, Seldeg must wait 1 hour before using this ability again.
HP 130; AC 39; Fort +28, Ref +25, Will +22 **Ruinous Weapons** Any weapon or unarmed attack Seldeg uses gains the effects of the _+1 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280)_ and [_greater flaming_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=295) runes. **Unyielding Block** At the start of each of Seldeg's turns, he gains two additional reactions he can use only to perform a [Shield Block](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=32). **Weapon Master** Seldeg has access to the [critical specialization effects](/Rules.aspx?ID=235) of any weapon he wields.
name: Seldeg Bheldis
